feed.title: Mack Body Builder News
feed.generator: AEM Project Franklin News feed generator (GitHub action)
feed.subtitle: Get the latest news from Mack® Trucks Body Builder Portal.

entry.title: Mack Medium Duty PTO Options
entry.content: Get the full Mack Medium Duty (MMD) Chassis PTO installation guide to help set up the correct applications for your vehicle.

entry.title: Mack Medium Duty-Trailer Wiring with Brake Controller
entry.content: For applications which require pulling a trailer with Electric Brakes, to prepare wiring to a brake controller, see attached instructions.

entry.title: Granite Headlamps and Auxiliary Lamps
entry.content: Mack Trucks certifies that its vehicles comply with all applicable Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards for operation in North America at the time of initial vehicle build

entry.title: GR In-Cab Battery Box Inspection
entry.content: In cab battery box option for Mack Granite Municipality and DOT Trucks with Snow Plow/Salt Spreader Application

entry.title: New Mack Model Description Cross Reference Chart Mack Trucks
entry.content: Mack is in the process of model name changes to new designations. For ease of understanding the new Mack model designations, view the old model versus the new model cross reference chart. For example, a GU813 (Rigid Truck) becomes a GR64BR (Granite 6X4, Axle Back, Rigid Truck).

entry.title: Mack Body Builder - Build with Confidence
entry.content: Mack Body Builder Support has developed one-stop shopping for Body Builders to meet all of their needs. To visit the Mack Body Builder Portal go to www.MackTrucks.com. If you haven

entry.title: mDrive HD now with Split Shaft PTO Functionality Mack Trucks
entry.content: Now with Split Shaft PTO functionality and 13- and 14-speed creeper gears, Mack

entry.title: VECU5 NEW MACK MODULE FOR 2022 MODEL YEAR
entry.content: A new vehicle control unit (VECU5) has been developed to support feature growth in the coming years. All DTC

entry.title: mDrive Auto Neutral Introduced by Mack
entry.content: Auto Neutral is now available on vehicles equipped with GHG 2017 engines and the new "F" generation mDrive.

entry.title: Mack Trucks Contract Awarded With Sourcewell
entry.content: Mack Trucks is pleased to announce a 4-year contract with Sourcewell, valid through August 1, 2024.

entry.title: Mack Introduces Rolling Start F-Series mDrive transmissions
entry.content: This new feature is desirable in Paving applications and allows the operator to go directly from Neutral to Drive without a service brake application.

entry.title: Customer Adaptation Center
entry.content: We specialize in heavy content specialty vehicles such as the MRU Twin and Tri Steer chassis, the GU8 80” Twin Steer with Cleartech DPF0106 Exhaust, Mechanical All Wheel Drive-Granite, Granite MHD and MRU, and Split-Box PTOs.

entry.title: New GR/Granite Improvements
entry.content: Find new improvements for the GR/Granite Mack Trucks for MPH signal, revised September, 2018.

entry.title: New Buffered Road Speed Signal at X156 Connector
entry.content: Road speed signal for devices used in spreader applications. Conventional Cabs for Mack Trucks built starting week 37 2023 and after.

entry.title: Updates to Pump Speed Calculator Tool
entry.content: Pump Speed calculator has some added features that would help with Split Shaft Programming and new pump offerings.
